sentences.en: a small bundle containing mostly clothing
sentences.cn: 一个小包袱，里面主要是衣服

sentences.en: Could you bundle these clothes off to my sister?
sentences.cn: 把这些衣服寄给我姐姐好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Could you bundle up these clothes? I'll take them to the post.
sentences.cn: 把这些衣服捆起来好 吗 ?我要带去邮寄.

sentences.en: Don't bundle all the clothes into that bag so carelessly.
sentences.cn: 别把所有的衣服随随便便塞进那个手提包里.

sentences.en: He confessed to having been a bundle of nerves.
sentences.cn: 他承认自己一直神经极度紧张。

sentences.en: He was bundled into a car and driven 50 miles to a police station.
sentences.cn: 他被塞进一辆小汽车，被带到50英里外的警察局。

sentences.en: In this cold wind you'd be wise to bundle up well.
sentences.cn: 这么冷的风,你还是穿暖点好.

sentences.en: Life at high school wasn't a bundle of laughs, either.
sentences.cn: 中学生活也不是充满欢笑。

sentences.en: Root this bundle of peonies in the garden.
sentences.cn: 使这束牡丹在花园里生根成长.

sentences.en: She has become a bundle of nerves, starting at the slightest sound.
sentences.cn: 她成了神经过敏的人, 听见一点点声响就惊恐不安.

sentences.en: She produced a bundle of notes and proceeded to count out one hundred and ninety-five pounds.
sentences.cn: 她拿出一捆钞票，接着数出了195英镑。

sentences.en: She tied the newspapers in a bundle.
sentences.cn: 她把报纸扎成一捆。

sentences.en: Splitting the price six ways had still cost them each a bundle.
sentences.cn: 即使把价钱平摊成6份，每人也还是要花一大笔钱。

sentences.en: The bundle fell with a thud.
sentences.cn: 扑腾一声,包掉下来了.

sentences.en: the last year hasn't been a bundle of fun.
sentences.cn: 去年一整年的情况都不令人鼓舞的。

sentences.en: the last year hasn't been a bundle of fun.
sentences.cn: 去年一整年的情况都不令人鼓舞的。

sentences.en: they don't really go a bundle on employing married women.
sentences.cn: 他们并不真想雇用已婚妇女。

sentences.en: Tom was a bundle of nerves at the interview.
sentences.cn: 汤姆在面试时非常紧张.

sentences.en: We want to bundle them off to bed quickly.
sentences.cn: 我们想尽快打发他们上床睡觉。

sentences.en: You can have it, but it'll cost you a bundle.
sentences.cn: 你可以买下它，不过你要花一大笔钱。

words.tran_cn: 包捆；把…撵走；归拢；匆忙地走（bundle的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)非常有趣的事，让人特别高兴的事
(澳／新西兰，非正式)放弃努力，垮掉

trans.tran_cn: 捆，包，一批，婴儿，极度，〈医〉集束化治疗
trans.tran_en: a group of things such as papers, clothes, or sticks that are fastened or tied together

trans.tran_cn: 赶，匆忙打发，捆绑销售（软件）
trans.tran_en: to include computer software or other services with a new computer at no extra cost

trans.tran_cn: 收集， 归拢； 把…塞入
trans.tran_en: If someone is bundled somewhere, someone pushes them there in a rough and hurried way
